title: Web Development
author: Steve Jones
textarea: This class teaches you how to code a web application connected to a database. You are learning the same skills that you learn in the industry.

title: GCU Campus
author: John Smith
textarea: GCU has a great campus. Students enjoy living on campus.

title: IT Jobs
author: Daniel Cutrara
textarea: There are various IT positions in the industry. Examples include programming, help desk, pc support and others.
